sub_title: I support (I)NGOs own their future. Grounded with a touch of the creative. Unravels complexity to manageable actions. Interim director| transition management| strategy consultancy
summary:
I support (International) NGOs own their future. I am a seasoned director, transition manager, strategic leader, programme developer and explorer of long term (funding) partnerships. As I am the kind of person who enjoys a good challenge, consider me your constructive friend and trustworthy management partner in organisational change and programme development processes. I help bring complexity back to manageable proportions and support organisations to device strategies that make their goals attainable. 

Through a structured approach and solid implementation, I create space for trust, co-creation and collaborative action. I empower and support strategy- partnership- and programme development teams to make daring but realistic strategies, partnerships and programmes happen. 

With roots in economic, social and climate justice, I am passionate about organisations that work for the wellbeing of people and planet. I offer senior change management capacity with analytical skill and strategic thinking and the ability to make these actionable - with feet in on the ground and my (and your) eye on the result.

And yes, I have a sense of humour too! 

Would you like to know more? Look forward to be in touch on zeekatconsult@yahoo.com
